summary: Shared Storage which means if you put something in a chest in Breezehome it will be in the Shared Storage Chest in Proudspire Manor and in all of the other player homes, at the same time!
descriptionHtml:
[color=red][b]WARNING[/b][/color] Back up your saves, just in case.
[color=red][b]WARNING[/b][/color] Also, if you have my other mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12299#content]Wyvern Sanctuary[/url] you will not need this as it has it built in with them in the Sanctuary also.

[IMG]http://i210.photobucket.com/albums/bb308/kraiglarner/SharedStorageChest.jpg[/IMG]

[b][size=5]Description[/size][/b]
Shared Storage which means if you put something in a chest in Breezehome it will be in the Shared Storage Chest in Proudspire Manor and in all of the other locations listed below, at the same time! 
[list] [*]Breezehome* (To the left of your front door, in the Living Room)
[*]Honeyside* (On the bookshelf, in the Bedroom)
[*]Vlindrel Hall* (To the left of the door in the Hallway)
[*]Hjerim* (To the right of the front door, in the Living Room)
[*]Proudspire Manor* (Left of the front door, on a shelf in the Living Room)
[*]Archmage Quarters (To the left of the tree, on a barrel)
[*]Hall of Attainment (In room with your bed on a barrel)
[*]Thieves Guild Headquarters (On left after the Flaggon entrance, on a top shelf)
[*]Jorrvaskr Basement (In bedroom area, behind the door)
[*]Dawnstar Sanctuary (In bedroom, on the shelf by the bed)[/list]
*note- All of the player home locations will not appear until you have purchased the equivalent decorating areas.

[b][size=5]Install[/size][/b]
1. Use NMM to install. Choose only one version. Should automatically activate once installed.
2. Manually install in Skyrim/Data folder. Activate esp in a mod loader.

[b][size=5]Uninstall[/size][/b]
Remove your possessions from the container then save.
1. Use NMM
2. Delete the .esp files from your Skyrim/Data folder.

[b][size=5]Version History[/size][/b]
v1.0
[list] [*]Shared Storage (read above for details)[/list]

[b][size=5]My other Mods[/size][/b]
[IMG]http://i210.photobucket.com/albums/bb308/kraiglarner/WyvernCliff.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i210.photobucket.com/albums/bb308/kraiglarner/Cavern.jpg[/IMG]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12299#content]Wyvern Sanctuary[/url]
author: Kraggle
